title: Rufus + Chaka - Masterjam (SHM-CD Japan 2012) [FLAC]
description:
Masterjam is the eighth studio album by funk band Rufus (billed as Rufus & Chaka), their debut on the MCA Records label following their purchase and dissolution of ABC Records, released in 1979.
Masterjam which was produced by Quincy Jones was the band's fourth album to top Billboard's R&B Albums chart and also reached #14 on Pop. The album includes the singles "Do You Love What You Feel", their fourth #1 hit on the R&B Singles chart and also #30 on Pop, "Any Love" (US R&B #24, 1980) and "I'm Dancing for Your Love" (US R&B #43, 1980). 


Rufus & Chaka - Masterjam
Label: Universal Music Japan / Geffen Records - UICY-25348
Format: CD, Album, Reissue, Remastered, SHM-CD
Country: Japan
Released: 17 Oct 2012
Originally released 1979
Genre: Funk / Soul
Style: Soul, Funk, Disco
